concept.title: PGI 225.7302 Preparation of Letter of Offer and Acceptance.

conbody.p: (i) Assist the DoD implementing agency, as necessary, in preparation of the Letter of Offer and Acceptance;
(ii) Identify and explain all unusual contractual requirements or requests for deviations; and
(iii) Assist in preparing the price and availability data.
